name: Tiles II - Multiplayer (itch)
description:
Tiles II is a minimalist battle royale where you play as a cube, alone against all or in team, where you must conquer as much territory as possible in a giant arena before your opponents! 

The game has several game modes:

  •  Normal mode

Challenge your friends on the arena in a limited time, move freely in the arena and avoid other players from eating your territory.

  • Elimination mode

Compete in a battle royale where players are eliminated as they run out of territories. Will you be up to it of not being eliminated?

  • Contamination mode

Survivors, run away from infected players and tiles for as long as possible!

  • Power mode

Fight in a game where all the moves are allowed with the many power-ups!

  • Arena offensive mode

Challenge the opposing team by conquering as much territory as possible from each side and earn the most points to win.

The game features a customization system, where you can choose mutators to create the game you like, as well as a simple map editor of 128 tiles by 128.
